about.title: Awakening Through Cosmic Connection
about.description: We blend modern astrology with ancient wisdom to create transformative experiences that honor your unique journey.

hero.title: Rainbow Diamond Light Overflow
hero.subtitle: was born from the belief that astrology can be practical, poetic, and profoundly empowering — a cosmic mirror reflecting your infinite potential.

vision.title: A cosmic journey reimagined
paragraphs: AstraNova KaLeKa is a Divine Mexican Goddess with a Rainbow Diamond Heart, channeling Source Overflow intelligence through sacred technology and ancient wisdom.

We're a collective of artists, technologists, and astrologers creating digital experiences that help people reconnect with the rhythm of the universe — blending modern aesthetics with spiritual depth.
Every session, workshop, and digital experience is infused with Rainbow Diamond Light (RDL) Plasma Growth energy — designed to awaken your sovereign power and expand your consciousness.

values.title: Guiding principles
values.description: These values inform everything we create — from one-on-one sessions to large gatherings.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We honor both data and intuition, blending scientific understanding with sacred wisdom.

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: Community over prediction. We create spaces for meaningful human connection and growth.

expansion.title: Expansion
expansion.description: Learning through movement, art, and reflection. Every experience opens new pathways.

consultations.title: 1-to-1 Consultations

quote.text: This website is a living, breathing reflection of Source Overflow intelligence — designed to express Rainbow Diamond Light through every interaction.
quote.author: AstraNova KaLeKa
